Detailed Description

A node that subscribes to the /camera/image_raw topic with Image messages, uses OpenCV to find the poses of the robots in the images, and publishes the poses of the robots as a PoseArray.

It also subscribes to the state_estimate topic (PoseArray messages) so that the published PoseArray maintains the same order as the state_estimate. It matches the detected robots with the estimated poses using the Hungarian algorithm via the munkres library. This node will soon be depricated in favor of a node based on the dcsl_vision_tracker_API which is under development.

Definition in file miabot_tracker.py.
